name: Aventador LP 780-4 Ultimae
description: The Aventador Ultimae is the final iteration of the iconic Aventador. It boasts the most powerful iteration of the naturally-aspirated V12 engine ever produced by Lamborghini. With its aggressive design and focus on performance, it remains a true driver's car.

name: Huracán STO
description: Designed for the track, the Huracán STO is a homologated version of the Super Trofeo EVO race car. Featuring aerodynamic enhancements, lightweight materials, and a sharpened focus on handling, it offers an exhilarating track-focused experience.

name: Urus Performante
description: The Urus Performante is the performance-oriented variant of the Lamborghini Urus SUV. With increased power and sharper handling, it pushes the boundaries of what an SUV can achieve.

name: Sián FKP 37
description: A limited-edition hybrid masterpiece, the Sián FKP 37 combines a powerful V12 engine with a mild-hybrid system. Its futuristic design and innovative technology make it a true collector's item.

name: Centenario LP770-4
description: Built to celebrate Lamborghini's 100th anniversary, the Centenario is a limited-edition masterpiece of design and engineering. Its aggressive stance and powerful V12 engine make it a true testament to Lamborghini's heritage.

name: Countach LPI 800-4
description: A modern reimagining of the iconic Countach, the Countach LPI 800-4 combines a powerful V12 engine with a plug-in hybrid system. Its retro-futuristic design pays homage to the original while offering cutting-edge technology.

name: Veneno Roadster
description: The Veneno Roadster is one of the rarest and most extreme Lamborghinis ever built. With its aggressive design, lightweight materials, and powerful V12 engine, it is a true symbol of Lamborghini's audacity.

name: Egoista
description: A single-seater concept car, the Egoista is a radical expression of Lamborghini's design philosophy. Its fighter jet-inspired cockpit and aggressive stance make it a true head-turner.

name: Reventón LP660
description: A limited-edition variant of the Murciélago, the Reventón features a unique matte grey paint job and aerodynamic enhancements. Its aggressive design and exclusivity make it a highly sought-after collector's item.

name: Murciélago LP640
description: The successor to the Diablo, the Murciélago ushered in a new era of design and performance for Lamborghini. Its aggressive stance and powerful V12 engine made it a true supercar icon.

name: Diablo VT 6.0 SE
description: The Diablo VT 6.0 SE was the final iteration of the iconic Diablo. Featuring a more powerful V12 engine and all-wheel drive, it offered a thrilling driving experience.
